comments: Or, n^2 followed by -n. - _Mohammad K. Azarian_, Aug 29 2005Also, +-A000217(m)+A000217(m-1) = 1+0,-1+0,3+1,-3+1,6+3,-6+3,..., for m>0. [_Bruno Berselli_, Jun 07 2013]
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,3,0,-3,0,1).
mathematica: LinearRecurrence[{0, 3, 0, -3, 0, 1}, {1, -1, 4, -2, 9, -3}, 60] (* _Bruno Berselli_, Jun 07 2013 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1 - x + x^2 + x^3) / (1 - x^2)^3, {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 19 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) /* By the second comment: */ A000217:=func<i | i*(i+1)/2>; [s*A000217(n)+A000217(n-1): s in [1,-1], n in [1..30]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Jun 07 2013
